basics.name: Einar Midthun
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a MSc in Computer Science/AI, Economy and Business, at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology, with an expected graduation Spring 2026. In the Fall of 2023, I'm doing an exchange semester at the University of Hawaii. In the Spring of 2024, I'll do an exchange semester at the University of Cape Town.

education.institution: Norwegian University of Science and Technology, Trondheim, Norway

work.company: Norwegian University of Science and Technology
work.summary: TA in an intro to computer science class and a grad class focusing on developing team cooperation skills.
Worked as a platoon sergeant in the army, and flight operations specialist in a SAR helicopter wing
highlights: Responsible for education, training, material and culture in a platoon of 20 soldiers
Supported a SAR crew in planning and coordinating their missions and training
Member, The Executive Board for students at Indøk @ NTNU, 2022-2023
